name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles
description: This installs the IL-2 Launcher and applies the required workarounds.

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/1C Game Studios/IL-2 Sturmovik Great Battles/bin/game/Launcher.exe
game.working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/1C Game Studios/IL-2 Sturmovik Great Battles/bin/game

content:
files:
- installer: http://cdn.il2sturmovik.net/x64/IL2_setup_Great_Battles.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/1C Game Studios/IL-2 Sturmovik Great Battles/bin/game/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/1C Game Studios/IL-2 Sturmovik
    Great Battles/bin/game
installer:
- task:
    app: dxvk corefonts vcrun2015 remove_mono win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: ShowDotFiles
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
